Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CULTURAL AFFAIRS, TOURISM, PARKS AND RECREATION

Title: Moves the Amistad Commission from the department of state to the state education department
Summary: Moves the Amistad Commission from the department of state to the state education department.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the arts and cultural affairs law, in relation to the Amistad Commission
